root.title: cenergi crg report 4th qtr net profit
root.body: cenergi corp report fourth quarter net incom 790,000 dlr seven ct per share revenu 7.7 mln dlr year report net loss 6.5 mln dlr 70 ct per share result writedown book valu oil ga properti first two quarter revenu 37 mln dlr follow compani fiscal year end march 31 1985 chang calend year end nine month end dec 31 1985 report loss 63.4 mln dlr 6.54 dlr per share revenu 47.6 mln dlr sai result noncash writedown oil ga properti year end march 31 1985 cenergi report net incom 3,705,000 dlr 36 ct per share revenu 71 mln dlr compani sai reserv year fall five mln barrel 6.4 mln barrel oil 60.1 bilion cubic foot ga 63.7 bcf sai reserv disappear avail produc price recov
